name: The Last Hope(Web Release)
description:
In the name of God

Hi and welcome, this is the first part of the game that I'm working, The Last Hope

In this game you need to help a group of survivors to survive The Elven Invasion 

They have close to no chance of surviving and you are their only hope, but you have no control over them and you are only a voice in their head, and some of them might not trust the voice so you are up to a really hard challenge, can you help them survive?

Main Features

-You can give feelings to survivors base on their needs

-You can see all the surrounding area of their shelter and give them a feeling they are in danger and be ready 

-You can observe the survivors and read their conversations with each others to see what trait they have and how you can help them better

-You can gain their trust by giving them the right feelings and whispering them nice things base on their traits, so you can give them more feelings 

-You can do nothing and watch them grow, make families and have kids, make friends and make enemies and handle the threat themselves, or you get attached to them and help them as much as you can

-Until next update (0.1) you only have 7 in game days to help the survivors so you might not see some of the game features

- And a lot more!

P.S.

This is the Web Version so saving is not in this version and only in pc version

PC version :  https://mrxtlh.itch.io/the-last-hope

This is only the beginning of development!

We also have a discord for the game, and you can get news about the game and behind the scene, this is the discord link, and you are always welcome to join us!
